role.argrole: thing arg0 cause to be created through rubbing

example.parse: (IP (NP-SBJ (NP (NP-PN (NR 澳洲)) (NP (NN 大地))) (CP (WHNP-1 (-NONE- *OP*)) (CP (IP (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *T*-1)) (VP (VA 原始))) (DEC 的))) (NP (NN 风貌))) (VP (PP-BNF (P 为) (NP (DNP (NP-PN (NR 罗卓瑶)) (DEG 的)) (NP (NN 创作)))) (VP (VV 擦出) (NP-OBJ (ADJP (JJ 新)) (NP (NN 火花))))))

为 罗卓瑶 的 创作
